text:
February 18, I960
Dr. Benjamin C. Willie
General Superintendent
Chicago Public Schools
28 North LaSalle Street
Chicago 1, Illinois
Dear Dr. Willie,
On January Hi I wrote you concerning the
possibility of the NAFB using material from the
Chicago Schools regarding utilisation of educaÂ¬
tional broadcasts.
We are most anxious to get this project
underway and would like to know if we will be
able to use the Chicago school material.
As of now I have not received an anwer
to my January lli letter and I am concerned that
something may have happened to either my letter
to you or your reply. If you need some additional
information about this project before making a
specific commitment, I will be happy to try
and answer any of your questions.
Sincerely,
Clair R. Tettemer, Sr.
Chairman, Television
Utilisation Subcommittee
CRT/gve
b/c Elizabeth Ma
Harold Hill
